listeningQuestion.question: Why did the husband remove the gate?
listeningQuestion.translation: 为什么丈夫把门卸了下来？

editorNotes: 本课讲述了一只名叫雷克斯的狗的故事，它学会了用爪子按门闩自己开门，但后来养成了反复进出花园的坏习惯。文章主要使用了used to、would、so that等表示习惯和目的的语法结构，以及多个与狗的行为相关的词汇。文章还涉及了训练动物和解决宠物行为问题的主题。

dialogueText.heading: 课文
dialogue: Our dog, Rex, used to sit outside our front gate and bark.
Every time he wanted to come into the garden he would bark until someone opened the gate.
As the neighbours complained of the noise, my husband spent weeks training him to press his paw on the latch to let himself in.
Rex soon became an expert at opening the gate.
However, when I was going out shopping last week, I noticed him in the garden near the gate.
This time he was barking so that someone would let him out!
Since then, he has developed another bad habit.
As soon as he opens the gate from the outside, he comes into the garden and waits until the gate shuts.
Then he sits and barks until someone lets him out.
After this he immediately lets himself in and begins barking again.
Yesterday my husband removed the gate and Rex got so annoyed we have not seen him since.

translation.heading: 翻译
notes: 我家的狗雷克斯，过去常坐在大门外面叫。
每当它想到花园里来时，便汪汪叫个不停，直到有人把门打开。
由于邻居们对狗叫很有意见，所以我丈夫花了几个星期的时间训练它用脚爪按住门闩把自己放进来。
雷克斯很快成了开门的专家。
然而上星期我正要出去买东西时，发现它正呆在花园里边靠门的地方。
这次它叫着让人把它放出去！
从那以后，它养成了另外一种坏习惯。
它从外面把门一打开，就走进花园，等着门自动关上。
这之后他就坐下汪汪叫起来，直到有人来把它放出去。
出去之后，它又马上把自己放进来，接着再开始叫。
昨天，我丈夫把大门卸了下来，雷克斯很生气，此后我们便再也没有见到它。

notes.title: 表示习惯和频率的表达
content: used to do sth. 表示过去常常做某事，现在已经不做了，如：Our dog, Rex, used to sit outside our front gate and bark.
would do sth. 也可以表示过去常常做某事，如：Every time he wanted to come into the garden he would bark until someone opened the gate.
every time = when，表示'每当，每次'，后面可以是点时间，也可以是段时间，如：Every time I turn to lesson 59, I will remember my teacher.

notes.title: 表示目的的表达方式
content: to/in order to/so as to 可以用来表示目的，如：I went to live in France to/in order to/so as to learn French.
so that/in order that 可以引导目的状语从句，从句中通常有情态动词，如：This time he was barking so that someone would let him out!
for sb. to do sth. 表示不定式的逻辑主语，当前后主语不一致时，比that结构更简洁，如：He was barking for someone to let him out.

notes.context: 表示对某事不满或抱怨
notes.example: As the neighbours complained of the noise, my husband spent weeks training him.

notes.context: 表示花费某段时间去做某事，人作主语
notes.example: My husband spent weeks training him to press his paw on the latch.

notes.phrase: become an expert at doing sth.
notes.context: 表示在某方面变得非常熟练
notes.example: Rex soon became an expert at opening the gate.

multipleChoice.question: He was barking ___ let him in.
multipleChoice.explanation: for sb. to do sth. = so that sb. do sth.，表示目的，当前后主语不一致时，比that结构更简洁。

multipleChoice.question: As soon as he ___ the gate from the outside he comes into the garden.
multipleChoice.explanation: as soon as引导状语从句，状语从句中使用一般现在时取代一般将来时。

fillInBlanks.sentence: I went to France ___ learn French.
fillInBlanks.hint: 表示目的的表达方式，可以用to、in order to或so as to

notes.title: 词汇扩展
notes.content: press的多种用法：1) 按，压，如：Can you press that button for me please? 2) 挤取，榨取，如：This is the time of the year when they press their grapes. 3) 催促，敦促，如：My parents pressed me to enter for the competition.

notes.title: 文化背景
notes.content: 这个故事反映了宠物训练中的有趣现象。虽然主人成功训练了狗学会开门，但狗却发展出了新的行为模式，这展示了动物学习的复杂性和有时出乎意料的结果。故事也暗示了解决宠物行为问题可能需要创造性思维，有时简单的解决方案（如移除门）可能比复杂的训练更有效。
